body: I’m trying to decide what my next #hobby should be! What do you think I should start? #newhobby #ideas
question: Which should be my next hobby?

comments.body: I voted for painting! It’s so therapeutic, and you can express yourself in so many ways. Plus, it’s something you can do at your own pace.
@56565 Painting does seem really calming. I’m just worried I might not be any good at it!
@45454 Don’t worry about that! It’s all about having fun and experimenting. You don’t need to be a pro to enjoy it.
Gardening all the way! It’s so rewarding to grow your own plants. Plus, it gets you outside and working with your hands.
@67676 Gardening sounds fun, but I’ve never had much of a green thumb. Any beginner tips?
@45454 Start with easy plants like herbs or succulents. They’re pretty low-maintenance and a great way to get started!
I voted for learning guitar! It’s challenging but super rewarding when you can play your first song. Plus, you’ll never get bored with all the songs to learn.
@78787 That’s a good point! I’ve always wanted to play guitar, but it seems tough to learn. How long did it take you to learn your first song?
@45454 It took me a couple of weeks to get the basics down, but once you push through the beginning stages, it gets way more fun!
I’m all for cooking new recipes! There’s nothing like creating something delicious and learning new techniques in the kitchen. Plus, you get to eat your hobby!
@89898 Haha, I love that! Cooking sounds like a practical hobby too. Do you have a favorite recipe I should try if I pick this?
@45454 Definitely! You should try making homemade pasta—it’s easier than you’d think and super satisfying!
